name: Stick-Powers
description:
Entry for of GDN2021 game jam Story

You suddenly discover one day that you have a stinging pain in your back. Your doctor tells you that you have super powers, and you think it's some kind of joke! It is the truth, you now have powers, but you can only use one at a time, and can only pick one again once you venture into unknown territory. 

Controls

The controls are rather simple : [A/D] or [left/right] to move, [space] to jump, and [j] to use your special ability.

Thank you for playing! 

Rate 5 stars for good luck!
